data.name: Ranchlife
data.detailed_description:
In our game Ranchlife you have endless possibilities to earn money.

You can plant seeds, water them regularly and after some time harvest and sell them.
You can also keep your own animals and use their products for other productions, which you can ultimately sell.

Now one naturally asks oneself where one can sell these goods. In the beginning there will be a small shop on your ranch where you can buy and sell. If you have earned some money, you can buy your own stall in the nearest town.

But with the starting tools, it would take ages to earn enough money. Therefore you can upgrade tools as well as your fields. With such upgrades, your fields will become larger and your tools more powerful.
data.about_the_game:
In our game Ranchlife you have endless possibilities to earn money.

You can plant seeds, water them regularly and after some time harvest and sell them.
You can also keep your own animals and use their products for other productions, which you can ultimately sell.

Now one naturally asks oneself where one can sell these goods. In the beginning there will be a small shop on your ranch where you can buy and sell. If you have earned some money, you can buy your own stall in the nearest town.

But with the starting tools, it would take ages to earn enough money. Therefore you can upgrade tools as well as your fields. With such upgrades, your fields will become larger and your tools more powerful.
data.short_description: There are a lot of farming simulations. But Ranchlife stands out with special features. A day/night system has been implemented to provide additional realism. Grow seeds, harvest vegetables and sell them at your own stall in town.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB) or AMD R9 290X (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX feature level 11_1 required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k (4 core 3.5 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 5 2400 G (4 core 3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD RX 570 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX feature level 11_1 required
